heading: HB01911
0: AN ACT CREATING THE CENTRAL LUZON RAILWAYS CORPORATION, PRESCRIBING ITS POWER, FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES, AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01911
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE CENTRAL LUZON RAILWAYS CORPORATION, PRESCRIBING ITS POWER, FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES, AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VIOLAGO, MICAELA S.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-26
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-01-31
          -A TWG was created, to be chaired by Rep. Mark Go, to consolidate all measures (19) proposing to amend the PNR, create Mindanao Railways and other rail-related measures
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-14
          -1st TWG meeting. Secretariat to consolidate the 19 bills and forward substitute bill to the Committees on Appropriations and Ways and Means for comments
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2018-03-14
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON TRANSPORTATION, LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION on 2016-08-03;SECONDARILY REFERRED TO TRANSPORTATION on 2016-08-03;
